data.title: HCL Technologies Limited
data.meta_description: Easily find Oracle partners with Expertise in building on, selling, and providing value-added services for Oracle technology. Search by specific location and product/solution area.
data.text: HCLTech Advantage SPADE SPADE is a 'low touch' solution to turbo charge your implementation of Oracle SaaS Cloud. It automates and simplifies the migration of the setup, master data and open transactions from various sources like Oracle EBS, PeopleSoft & JD Edwards to Oracle SaaS applications.
